description: Primes p such that x^52 = 2 has no solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A049584 relative to A000040.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok[p_] := Reduce[Mod[x^52 - 2, p] == 0, x, Integers] == False; Select[Prime[Range[100]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 21 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(500) | not exists{x: x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^52 eq 2}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 21 2012(PARI)N=10^4;  default(primelimit,N);ok(p, r, k)={ return ( (p==r) || (Mod(r,p)^((p-1)/gcd(k,p-1))==1) ); }forprime(p=2,N, if (! ok(p,2,52),print1(p,", ")));/* _Joerg Arndt_, Sep 21 2012 */
author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Feb 02 2001
